alert.note: Alert for Animas River Basin; Central Colorado River Basin; San Juan River Basin; Upper Gunnison River Valley (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 09 at 11:48AM MST until November 09 at 5:00PM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph. * WHERE...Central Colorado River Basin, Upper Gunnison River Valley, Animas River Basin and San Juan River Basin. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. People, especially those with respiratory illnesses, heart disease, the elderly, and children are recommended to stay indoors and avoid prolonged outdoor exercise or heavy exertion due to wind-blown dust.

area.areaDesc: Animas River Basin; Central Colorado River Basin; San Juan River Basin; Upper Gunnison River Valley
